text: Júlio de Lemos de Castro Caldas (19 November 1943 – 4 January 2020) was a Portuguese lawyer and politician. He was elected to the Assembly of the Republic in 1980, serving until 1983. He later served as Minister of National Defence from 1999 to 2001. Castro Caldas was born in Lisbon. Castro Caldas died on 4 January 2020 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Lisbon Category:Portuguese lawyers
title: Júlio Castro Caldas
